title: The annales of Cornelius Tacitus. The description of Germanie
author: Tacitus, Cornelius.
publisher: By Arn. Hatfield, for Bonham and Iohn Norton],
notes: Printer's and publishers' names from colophon.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "[par.]".
Issued with "The ende of Nero and beginning of Galba", 2nd ed. (STC 23643).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
